short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Detects web3 transactions triggered from the browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Web3 Transaction Detector is a Chrome extension that allows developers to detect web3 transactions triggered from the browser. Our extension intercepts eth_sendTransaction method calls from the Metamask extension and logs the transaction details in the console. This feature can be used by developers to debug or further develop their projects.

Please note that we do not collect or store any personal information or data related to the detected transactions. Our extension only logs the transaction details in the console for the developer's use.

We value the privacy and security of our users and are committed to being transparent about our extension's functionality. If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to contact us.
